summary: Addressed all 7 FIX/NOTE tags in ConstitutiveFoundation.tex: added consistent dependent type theory notation to state modality definitions, converted verification subsection to remark, added exclusivity/exhaustivity constraints, defined verum/falsum as negations of bot/top, defined all four extremal bilateral propositions, and added homomorphism identities. Document compiles successfully (38 pages).
